process.name: Unsaved Changes Prompt System MI Reporting
process.narrative: Test process to ensure that when changes are made to System > System - Reporting screen settings a prompt is displayed to inform the user of unsaved changes if navigating away from the section.

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
GIVEN I am a BP user
AND I navigate to System > System > Reporting

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: WHEN I change MI Reporting settings AND I navigate away from System THEN an Unsaved Changes prompt is presented AND WHEN I select to Not Save the changes THEN the settings changes are not being saved

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: WHEN I change MI Reporting settings AND I navigate away from System THEN an Unsaved Changes prompt is presented AND WHEN I select to Save the changes THEN the settings changes are being saved

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: WHEN I change MI Reporting settings AND I navigate inside System THEN an Unsaved Changes prompt is presented AND WHEN I select to Not Save the changes THEN the settings changes are not being saved

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: WHEN I change MI Reporting settings AND I navigate inside System THEN an Unsaved Changes prompt is presented AND WHEN I select to Save the changes THEN the settings changes are being saved

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: WHEN I change MI Reporting settings AND I click to Sign Out THEN an Unsaved Changes prompt is presented AND WHEN I select to Not Save the changes THEN the settings changes are not being saved

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: WHEN I change MI Reporting settings AND I select to Sign Out THEN an Unsaved Changes prompt is presented AND WHEN I select to Save the changes THEN the settings changes are being saved

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: WHEN I change MI Reporting settings AND I click to Close BP THEN an Unsaved Changes prompt is presented AND WHEN I select to Not Save the changes THEN the settings changes are not being saved

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: WHEN I change MI Reporting settings AND I click to Close BP THEN an Unsaved Changes prompt is presented AND WHEN I select to Save the changes THEN the settings changes are being saved

output.name: pid
output.narrative: PID of the process

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

output.name: Error Message
output.narrative: Error message received while Login

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

stage.name: Use external tools to refresh stats Status
Use external tools to refresh stats

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Sub Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the sub item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

stage.name: Ensure 'Collect utilisation & productivity stats' setting changes Saved
Check 'Collect utilisation and productivity statistics' enabled
Ensure 'Auto Refresh stats daily' setting changes Not Saved
Read 'Collect utilisation and productivity stats' Status

output.name: Collect utilisation & productivity stats setting
output.narrative: The setting for Collect utilisation and productivity statistics

stage.name: Is 'Collect utilisation and productivity stats' enabled?

input.name: Collect utilisation and productivity statistics
input.narrative: The value of the collect stats setting you want to select.

input.name: Collect utilisation and productivity statistics
input.narrative: The value of the collect stats setting you want to select.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Unsaved Changes prompt expected?
input.narrative: Is Unsaved Changes warning expected?

input.name: Button Option
input.narrative: Choose if to save, not or cancel changes

input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Sub Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the sub item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

stage.name: Read 'Collect utilisation and productivity stats' Status

output.name: Collect utilisation & productivity stats setting
output.narrative: The setting for Collect utilisation and productivity statistics

stage.name: Is 'Collect utilisation and productivity stats' status correct?

decision.expression: [Collect utilisation & productivity stats setting]=[Collect utilisation & productivity stats setting1]

exception.detail: "System Reporting Changes have been incorrectly saved"

Read 'Collect utilisation and productivity stats' Status
